name: Shape Eater
description:
This is my second game jam project. Although I had 72 hours, more than my first, I ended up with far less than that due to personal reasons. That said I have managed get something out, simple as it is. I've enjoyed the process of creating this game, and have learnt much about game development, both in Godot and the development process as well. My time management still needs a bit of work though.

Credits:

  • Music - rezoner @ opengameart.org
  • Assets (what few there are) - MattBann
  • Game engine - Godot
